explanation: The majority of comments about BTC are bullish, with mentions of significant investments to pump the price, expectations of breaking all-time highs, and confidence in BTC holding up at current price levels. Although there are a few short suggestions and comments about sideways action or retail shorting, the dominant sentiment is positive. Representative opinions include direct calls to 'long btc and sleep', references to millions of dollars pumping the market, and positive remarks on BTC's resilience.
representative_opinions: LORD UZI: long btc and sleep
LORD UZI: millions of dollars have been invested into the market to pump this time btc is going to break the all time high
Neev: im impressed by how well btc is holding up here, up and to the right
